articles.author: Alex Harring, Fred Imbert
articles.title: Dow slides 500 points to start September, Nasdaq headed for worst loss since early August rout: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: Stocks declined Tuesday as technology names struggled and new economic data concerned traders.
articles.content:
Stocks tumbled Tuesday as technology names struggled and new economic data rekindled fears around the health of the economy.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average traded 611 points lower, or 1.5%. The S&… [+1920 chars]
